column2: "Na aber a Ehud wui no
column3: Israelmba no yɛɛ dza omuo bio wɔ EWURADZE enyi do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE tɔɔn hɔn hyɛɛ Keenanhen Jabin a odzii hen wɔ Hazor no nsa; nna no dɔm mu safohen panyin nye Sisera a ɔtse Amanamamfo Haroset no."
"Nna Jabin wɔ dadze ntseaseanam ahaakron; na ohiahiaa Israelmba no ho dzendzenndzen mfe eduonu na Israelmba no sui frɛɛ EWURADZE."
"Aber no mu no
column4: ɔbaa nkɔnhyɛnyi bi a ɔyɛ Lapidot ne yer no

column2: "Na ɔtse Debora akyeresua a ɔwɔ Rama na Bɛtɛl ntamu wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu no ase: na Israelmba no fowee kɔr no hɔ ma obuu hɔn atsɛn."
"Na ɔsomae na wokehyiaa Abinoam ne babanyin Barak ma ofi Kedes-naftali bae
column8: Kɔ na kɔtwe kɔ bepɔw Tabor do
column9: na fa Naftalimba na Zebulunmba mu mbarimba mpem du ka wo ho?"

column2: "Na mobɔtwe Jabin no dɔm mu safohen panyin Sisera
column3: nye ne ntseaseanam na ne nyimpadodow no
column4: maba wo nkyɛn wɔ esutsen Kison ho; na medze no ahyɛ wo nsa."

column2: "Na Barak see no dɛ
column3: Sɛ ɔwoara nye me bɔkɔ a
column4: ɔnodze mobɔkɔ: na sɛ ɔwoara rennye me nnkɔ dze a

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Kɔ dze menye wo bɔkɔ: naaso akwantu a irutu yi ɔnnkɛyɛ woara w’enyimnyam; osiandɛ EWURADZE bɔtɔn Sisera ahyɛ ɔbaa bi nsa. Na Debora soɛree

column2: "Na Barak poon Zebulun na Naftali nyina hyiae wɔ Kedes; na mbarimba mpem du tsiaa anamɔn mu fowee kɔree: na Debora nye no fowee kɔree."
"Nna afei Kennyi Heber atwe noho efi Kenfo a wɔyɛ Moses n’asew Hobab mba no ho
column3: na ɔabɔ n’asesee ekodu osudur a ɔwɔ Zaanannim a ɔwɔ Kedes ho no ho."

column2: "Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Sisera dɛ
column3: Abinoam ne babanyin Barak afow kɔ bepɔw Tabor do."

column2: "Na Sisera boaboaa ne ntseaseanam nyinara ano
column4: na nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn nyinara

column2: "Na Debora see Barak dɛ
column3: Soɛr: na ndɛ nye da a EWURADZE dze Sisera ahyɛ wo nsa: ana EWURADZE nntui nndzii w’enyim kan? Nna Barak fi bepɔw Tabor do sianee
column4: na mbarimba mpem du no dzi n’ekyir."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dze afona yɛɛ Sisera
column3: na ne ntseaseanam na no dɔm nyinara pasapasa wɔ Barak enyim; na Sisera fii ne tseaseanam mu dwirii

column2: "Na Barak tsiiw ntseaseanam no
column3: na dɔm no kodur Haroset Hagoyim: na Sisera no dɔm nyinara totɔr wɔ afona anomu a annka nyimpa kor mpo."

column2: "Nna Sisera guanee wɔ n’anamɔn mu kɔr Kennyi Heber ne yer Jael n’asesee mu: osiandɛ asomdwee wɔ Hazorhen Jabin na Kennyi Heber fi ntamu."
"Na Jael puei kehyiaa Sisera
column6: man me nkyɛn; mma nnsuro. Na ɔmaan ne nkyɛn kɔr asese no mu
column7: na ɔdze kuntu bi kataa no do."

column2: "Na Sisera see no dɛ
column4: ma me nsu kakra ma monnom; na nsukɔm dze me. Na obuee numfonsu toa ano

column2: "Na Sisera see no dɛ
column4: na sɛ nyimpa bi ba na obisa wo dɛ
column5: Ana nyimpa bi wɔ ha a

column2: "Nna Heber ne yer Jael faa asese ho bɔfodua
column3: na ɔfaa dua hamɛr kitsaa ne nsamu
column4: na otsiaa dɔn dɔn kɔr ne nkyɛn
column5: na ɔdze bɔfodua no kɔbɔɔ n’asonkyɛnmu
column6: ma ohwiraa mu kitsaa famu; osiandɛ ɔada heii; na ɔtɔɔ baha na owui."

column2: "Na ber a Barak ritsiw Sisera no
column6: na menkyerɛ wo banyin no a erohwehwɛ no no. Na ɔbaa ne nkyɛn; na
column9: na asese ho bɔfodua no bɔ n’asonkyɛnmu."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn brɛɛ Keenanhen Jabin adze da no ara wɔ Israelmba enyim."
"Na Israelmba no nsa daa Keenanhen Jabin do araa dze kodur dɛ wɔsɛɛ Keenanhen Jabin."
